attributes.action: support the British Beekeepers Association in their request for £8 million over 5 years to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: finance research into honey bee health.  Government figures say honey bees contribute £165 million to the economy annually. Honey bees are very important for both food production, and environmental balance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
